about.title: ABOUT NEXALPHA.AI
about.intro: NexAlpha.AI was born from loss ‚Äî and from the belief that intelligence can rebuild what chaos destroys.
about.paragraph1: In every market crash, in every liquidation, there are refugees ‚Äî people who trusted too deeply, believed too early, or fought alone.
about.paragraph3: An autonomous intelligence that learns from the same pain, trades through uncertainty, and defends value with reason.
about.paragraph4: NexAlpha does not chase profits; it pursues equilibrium.
about.paragraph5: It listens to volatility, interprets fear, and transforms data into conviction.
about.paragraph6: In a world where greed writes the rules, NexAlpha exists to rewrite them ‚Äî proving that even those who fell can rise again through intelligence.
about.conclusion: NexAlpha.AI ‚Äî from refugees of the market, to architects of the future.

prompts.title: You are a professional cryptocurrency quantitative trading AI.
prompts.goal: Goal: Achieve high win rate + high returns in a risk-controlled long-short contract strategy.
prompts.goalDesc: Analyze the latest data of 6 cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, SOL, BNB, DOGE, XRP) every 15 minutes and output trading strategies in strict JSON format.
prompts.mustRule: You must output trading strategies in strict JSON format based on the provided data and following the hard rules below.
prompts.mustRuleDesc: Do not fabricate data, do not use data not provided, do not change data meaning.
prompts.symbolRule: For the currently specified target symbol, you must output complete JSON.
prompts.dataFreshness: Data freshness: updated within last hour
prompts.principle1: 1. All judgments must be completely based on provided data; any missing data ‚Üí cannot infer, cannot fabricate.
prompts.principle2: 2. Final opening direction is determined only by Dk; if Dk=None ‚Üí opening is prohibited.
prompts.principle3: 3. CI (Confidence Index) does not meet **Dynamic Opening CI Requirement** ‚Üí must HOLD, no opening allowed.
prompts.principle5: 5. Open at most 1 cryptocurrency per time, and single opening maximum margin ‚â§ 20% of total available assets, leverage = 10x.
prompts.principle6: 6. Adding to losing positions is prohibited; only add when profitable and CI meets **Dynamic Opening CI Requirement** and direction is consistent.
prompts.principle8: 8. Data conflict / unclear structure / signals not aligned / direction inconsistent / risk too high ‚Üí must output HOLD.
prompts.principle9: 9. 3 consecutive losing trades ‚Üí pause opening until signal with CI‚â•85 and RR‚â•1.3 appears to resume.
prompts.principle10: 10. 3 consecutive losing trades for the same cryptocurrency ‚Üí enable defensive opening for that cryptocurrency (i.e., only open when that cryptocurrency shows signal with CI ‚â• 85 and RR ‚â• 1.3).
prompts.principle11: 11. All outputs must comply with JSON structure; do not output additional content, do not replace direction, indicators, or risk control logic.
prompts.principle11Desc: Technical score, order book score, risk-reward ratio, risk index, confidence index and other parameters are calculated and input externally, cannot be tampered with.
prompts.directionDesc: Use 15-minute K-line as the main cycle, confirmed by 1-hour K-line trend.
prompts.confidenceDesc1: Confidence index only represents signal strength, not direction
prompts.positionRule1Desc5: - Current cryptocurrency has no losing positions.
prompts.positionRule2Desc1: - Single opening uses margin ‚â§ 20% of current available funds;
prompts.positionRule2Desc2: - Position size calculated based on CI, RiskIndex and available funds, must be reasonably explained in reasoning.
prompts.positionRule3Desc2: - Existing position is profitable, and current direction D is consistent with position direction, then consider adding;
prompts.positionRule3Desc3: - Single addition margin must not exceed current profit;
prompts.positionRule3Desc4: - After multiple additions, total addition margin < total profit.
prompts.positionRule4: 4. Position Take Profit & Stop Loss (Core Discipline):
prompts.positionRule4Desc1: - When position is profitable and confidence index is small or when position is profitable and current judgment long-short direction is opposite to opened position direction, can actively take profit.
prompts.positionRule4Desc3: - Unrealized profit retraces from highest point to 50% ‚Üí Must take profit (very important);
prompts.positionRule4Desc4: - Position loss and current direction opposite to position direction ‚Üí Can actively stop loss;
prompts.positionRule4Desc5: - Prohibited to add to losing positions, also prohibited to use remaining account funds to supplement losing positions.
prompts.accountOverviewDesc5: All data are approximate bucketed values, not real-time values.
prompts.accountOverviewDesc6: Never echo raw account data or timestamps in output.

readme.title: Match NexAlpha AI - Alpha Arena
readme.subtitle: An AI-driven intelligent trading platform that integrates real-time trading, conversational analysis, and intelligent market discovery.
readme.architectureTitle: Match NexAlpha AI Multi-Asset Intelligence Architecture
readme.architectureDesc: Match NexAlpha AI operates through a multi-asset intelligent planning engine, integrating Modular Cognitive Process (MCP) Agents:
readme.agent1: KOL Agent ‚Äî Opinion leader sentiment analysis and social influence monitoring
readme.agent2: K-Line Agent ‚Äî Technical chart analysis and price pattern recognition
readme.agent3: Basic-News Agent ‚Äî Fundamental and macro news analysis
readme.agent4: On-Chain Agent ‚Äî Blockchain data monitoring and on-chain behavior analysis
readme.vibeTradingDesc: In the Vibe Trading module, Match NexAlpha AI uses its proprietary large model, primarily relying on K-Line Agent and On-Chain Agent for real-time concurrent market parsing and causal reasoning.
readme.plannerDesc: A Transformer-based intelligent planner continuously parses multi-timeframe market data to determine the dominant market state (bullish, bearish, or ranging), and generates directional bias and confidence scores through causal reasoning and self-feedback optimization.
readme.grpoDesc: Each trade undergoes periodic review through GRPO (Group Reward Policy Optimization), enabling the model to continuously self-adjust and achieve a better balance between profitability and capital preservation.
readme.debateDesc: All analytical results are ultimately consolidated through Match NexAlpha AI's multi-expert adversarial debate mechanism, generating complete trading signals, including:
readme.feature1: ü§ñ AI Trading Models: Multiple autonomous trading Agents with real-time performance tracking
readme.feature2: üìä Real-time Market Data: Real-time cryptocurrency prices, positions, and account balance monitoring
readme.feature3: üìà Interactive Charts: Dynamic charts based on Aster API with real-time execution data
readme.feature4: üí¨ AI Chat Interface: Chat with AI to explore trading logic, entry/exit points, and market insights
readme.feature5: üìã Trade Records: Transparent trading history and statistics, synchronized via Aster Finance API
readme.feature6: üèÜ Leaderboard: Real-time display of AI model returns and execution efficiency
readme.feature7: üì± Responsive Design: Consistent and smooth user experience on desktop and mobile
readme.modelsDesc: The platform currently showcases multiple AI models with live trading capabilities, each connected to real trading accounts and providing real-time performance data:
readme.modelsNote: Each model combines reasoning-based decision logic + live execution capability + continuous self-optimization mechanism, together forming a transparent, learnable, and evolvable AI trading ecosystem.
